name: barberpro-platform
description: BarberPro - Premium service booking platform for Argentina

scripts._comment_docker: === Docker Commands (Primary workflow - everything runs in Docker) ===
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && make up && make db-migrate
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/.svelte-kit
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev: echo 'DEPRECATED: Use npm start (or make up) instead' && exit 1
scripts.backend: echo 'DEPRECATED: Backend now runs in Docker with npm start' && exit 1
scripts.frontend: echo 'DEPRECATED: Frontend now runs in Docker with npm start' && exit 1

_comment: For complete Docker management with 30+ commands, colored output, and health checks, use the Makefile directly: `make help`. The docker:* npm scripts above provide cross-platform alternatives for the most common commands.
